Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface GameInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameInterface extends Serializable
The GameInterface interface contains all the necessary methods to play that, when called, bring a game from one valid state to another valid state

  • Method Summary

    activateCharacterCard(String playerNickname, CharacterID characterID)
    The method activateCharacterCard, if the move is valid, activates the CharacterCard with that CharacterID for the current turn and performs any potential initial effect

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(String nickname) throws NicknameNotAvailableException, WrongGamePhaseException
      The method addPlayer adds a Player to the Game if there isn't already another with the same nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname that will be assigned to the new Player
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during initialisation
      NicknameNotAvailableException - when the given nickname is already used by another Player

    • chosenCard

      void chosenCard(String playerNickname, Card card) throws NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongGamePhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      The method sets currCard of the currentPlayer to card if the game phase is correct, the choice is valid and playerNickname is the nickname of the current Player. If every Player has chosen a Card the method calls createOrderActionPhase and initActionPhase
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that called this method
      card - the chosen Card
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during planning
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when the card choice is not valid

    • moveStudentToChamber

      void moveStudentToChamber(String playerNickname, Clan clan) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      The method moveStudentToChamber moves a student of the specified Clan from the Hall to the Chamber of the current Player
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan of the student to move
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no student of the given clan in the hall of the current Player or the chamber has already the maximum number of students of the given clan

    • moveStudentToIsland

      void moveStudentToIsland(String playerNickname, Clan clan, int islandIndex) throws WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException
      The method moveStudentToChamber moves a student of the specified Clan from the Hall of the current Player to the Island with the specified index
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan of the student to move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which to move the student
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no student of the given clan in the hall of the current Player

    • moveMotherNature

      void moveMotherNature(String playerNickname, int islandIndex) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      The method moveMotherNature moves Mother Nature on the Island with the specified index, calls checkInfluence and updates the state of the Turn. If it's the last round it calls endTurn
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which to move Mother Nature
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the student moving phase
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index
      NotValidMoveException - when the Island with the given index is too distant to be reached by Mother Nature

    • chosenCloud

      void chosenCloud(String playerNickname, int cloudIndex) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException, WrongTurnPhaseException, NotValidMoveException
      The method chosenCloud, if the choice is valid, adds the students on the Cloud with the given index to the Hall of the current Player
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      cloudIndex - the index of the chosen Cloud
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Cloud with the given index
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the cloud choosing phase
      NotValidMoveException - when the Cloud with the given index has already been picked

    • endTurn

      void endTurn(String playerNickname) throws WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, WrongTurnPhaseException
      The method endTurn calls InitRound if the current Player is the last one of this round phase, otherwise it instantiates a new Turn for the next Player
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when it is called not during the end turn phase

    • activateCharacterCard

      void activateCharacterCard(String playerNickname, CharacterID characterID) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      The method activateCharacterCard, if the move is valid, activates the CharacterCard with that CharacterID for the current turn and performs any potential initial effect
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      characterID - the CharacterID of the CharacterCard to activate
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when the selected character is not in this game or it is not available, another character card has been activated in this turn or the Player does not have enough coins to pay for it

    • applyCharacterCardEffect

      void applyCharacterCardEffect(String playerNickname, int islandIndex) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidIndexException, NotValidMoveException
      The method applyCharacterEffect applies the effect of the CharacterCard currently active on the Island with the specified index
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the Island on which the effect has to be applied
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, its effect has already been applied or the move is not valid
      NotValidIndexException - when there is no Island with the given index

    • setClanCharacter

      void setClanCharacter(String playerNickname, Clan clan) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      The method setClanCharacter calls the method setCharacterClan on the current Turn, setting a Clan variable necessary for some CharacterCards to perform their effects
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      clan - the Clan chosen by the Player
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, or the Clan for the effect of the character card has already been set

    • applyCharacterCardEffect

      void applyCharacterCardEffect(String playerNickname, int islandIndex, Map<Clan,Integer> students1, Map<Clan,Integer> students2) throws ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongGamePhaseException, NonExistingPlayerException, WrongPlayerException, NotValidMoveException
      The method applyCharacterEffect applies the effect of the CharacterCard currently active with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the Player that requested this move
      islandIndex - the index of the destination Island for the students moved (if necessary)
      students1 - the students to move to the destination (if necessary)
      students2 - the students to move from the destination, in case of an exchange of students (if necessary)
      Throws:
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when it is called in a not expert game
      WrongGamePhaseException - when it is called not during the action phase
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no Player with the given nickname
      WrongPlayerException - when it is not the turn of the player with the given nickname
      NotValidMoveException - when there is no activated character card, its effect has already been applied or the move is not valid

      GameState getGameState()
